author: Al Jazeera
title: Spain overtakes Italy in virus cases, though death rate slows
description: Spain is now second in the number of coronavirus infections only to the United States.
content:
Spain overtook Italy for the first time on Friday for the number of confirmed coronavirus cases, but the overnight death toll fell from the previous day, providing a small glimmer of hope.
With a total 117,710 confirmed cases, Spain is now second in the numb… [+2540 chars]
